title: Difference between new and old library schedules

content.prompt: How does the new library schedule differ from the old one?

choices.label: Weekday hours have changed, but weekend hours remain the same as before.
The library closes half an hour earlier in the evening.
The library is open longer each day.
The library opens later in the morning.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
